001package driver;
002
003import graphics.Graphics;
004import interfaces.*;
005import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.logging.Level;
008import java.util.logging.Logger;
009import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
010import parser.Interpreter;
011import parser.Parser;
012import priorityqueues.ladderq.LadderQ;
013import random.MersenneTwister19937;
014
015/**
016 * Simulation Driver class, implement public Interface {@link DriverInterface}.
017 * @author Borja Zarco
018 */
019class Driver extends DriverInterface {
020    
021    private PriorityQueue queue;
022    private RandomNumberGenerator RNG;
023    private Graphics graphics;
024    private boolean graphicsLive;
025    private boolean printTrace;
026    private int nEventsRun;
027            
028    private ArrayList<Road> roads;
029    private ArrayList<IntersectionInterface> intersections;
030    private ArrayList<Parking> parkings;
031    private ArrayList<Path> paths;
032    private ArrayList<IntersectionInterface> destinations;
033    private ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicles;
034    
035    /**
036     * Suppresses constructor, ensuring non-instantiability.
037     * Called by {@link #getInstance(int)}.
038     */
039    protected Driver(int seed) { super(); init(seed); }
040    
041    /**
042     * Initializes empty Driver.
043     */
044    private void init(int seed) {
045        queue = new LadderQ();
046        RNG = new MersenneTwister19937(seed);
047        printTrace = false;
048        nEventsRun = 0;
049        roads = new ArrayList<Road>();
050        intersections = new ArrayList<IntersectionInterface>();
051        parkings = new ArrayList<Parking>();
052        paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
053        destinations = new ArrayList<IntersectionInterface>();
054        vehicles = new ArrayList<Vehicle>();
055    }
056    
057    /**
058     * Static method to access singleton instance of Driver.
059     * It also instantiates it if first time.
060     * @return {@link #instance instance of Driver}.
061     */
062    public static DriverInterface getInstance(int seed) {
063        if(instance == null) { instance = new Driver(seed); }
064        return instance;
065   }
066    
067    @Override
068    public void setPrintTrace(boolean printTrace) { this.printTrace = printTrace; }
069
070    @Override
071    public boolean isPrintingTrace() { return printTrace; }
072
073    @Override
074    public RandomNumberGenerator getRNG() { return RNG; }
075    
076    // Queue Methods
077    @Override
078    public PriorityQueue getQueue() { return queue; }
079    @Override
080    public void runSimmulation() {
081        while(!getQueue().isEmpty()) {
082            getQueue().dequeue().run();
083            nEventsRun++;
084        }
085        repaintGraphics();
086    }
087    @Override
088    public int getNEventsRun() { return nEventsRun; }
089
090    // Roads Methods
091    @Override
092    public void addRoad(Road road) { roads.add(road); }
093    @Override
094    public ArrayList<Road> getRoads() { return roads; }
095    @Override
096    public Road getRoad(int i) {
097        for(Road road : roads) {
098            if(road.getID() == i) return road;
099        }
100        return null;
101    }
102    @Override
103    public int isRoadDefined(IntersectionInterface IS1, IntersectionInterface IS2) {
104        for(Road road : roads) {
105            if(road.Is1 == IS1 && road.Is2 == IS2) return road.getID();
106            else if(road.Is1 == IS2 && road.Is2 == IS1) return road.getID();
107        }
108        return -1;
109    }
110    
111    // Intersections Methods
112    @Override
113    public void addIntersection(IntersectionInterface intersection) { intersections.add(intersection); }
114    @Override
115    public ArrayList<IntersectionInterface> getIntersections() { return intersections; }
116    @Override
117    public IntersectionInterface getIntersection(int i) {
118        for(IntersectionInterface intersection : intersections) {
119            if(intersection.getID() == i) return intersection;
120        }
121        return null;
122    }
123    @Override
124    public void startIntersections() {
125        for(IntersectionInterface intersection : intersections) {
126            intersection.setModes();
127        }
128    }
129    
130    // Parkings Methods
131    @Override
132    public void addParking(Parking parking) { parkings.add(parking); }
133    @Override
134    public ArrayList<Parking> getParkings() { return parkings; }
135    @Override
136    public Parking getParking(int i) {
137        for(Parking parking : parkings) {
138            if(parking.getID() == i) return parking;
139        }
140        return null;
141    }
142    
143    // Paths Methods
144    @Override
145    public void addPath(Path path) { paths.add(path); }
146    @Override
147    public ArrayList<Path> getPaths() { return paths; }
148    @Override
149    public Path getPath(int i) {
150        for(Path path : paths) {
151            if(path.getID() == i) return path;
152        }
153        return null;
154    }
155    @Override
156    public Path getPath(Parking parking, IntersectionInterface destination) {
157        for(Path path : paths) {
158            if(path.getParking() == parking && path.getDestination() == destination) return path;
159        }
160        return null;
161    }
162    @Override
163    public boolean hasPath(Parking parking) {
164        for(Path path : paths) {
165            if(path.getParking() == parking) return true;
166        }
167        return false;
168    }
169    
170    // Destinations Methods
171    @Override
172    public void addDestination(IntersectionInterface destination) {destinations.add(destination); }
173    @Override
174    public ArrayList<IntersectionInterface> getDestinations() { return destinations; }
175    @Override
176    public IntersectionInterface getDestination(int i) {
177        for(IntersectionInterface intersection : destinations) {
178            if(intersection.getDestinationID() == i) return intersection;
179        }
180        return null;
181    }
182    @Override
183    public void printDestinationsVehicleCount() {
184        for(IntersectionInterface intersection : destinations) {
185            System.err.println("Destination " + intersection + " received " + intersection.getVehicleCount() + " vehicles");
186        }
187    }
188    
189    // Vehicles Methods
190    @Override
191    public void addVehicle(Vehicle vehicle, Parking parking) {
192        vehicles.add(vehicle);
193        parking.addVehicle(vehicle);
194    }
195    @Override
196    public ArrayList<Vehicle> getVehicles() { return vehicles; }
197    @Override
198    public Vehicle getVehicle(int i) { return vehicles.get(i); }
199    @Override
200    public boolean removeVehicle(Vehicle vehicle) { return vehicles.remove(vehicle); }
201    
202    // Misc Methods
203    @Override
204    public void parse(String roadNetworkFile, String routesFile) {
205        Interpreter.runLines(Parser.getTokenizedLines(roadNetworkFile, true),Interpreter.Data.ROAD);
206        Interpreter.runLines(Parser.getTokenizedLines(routesFile, false),Interpreter.Data.MAIN);
207    }
208    @Override
209    public void startGraphics(boolean graphicsLive) {
210        this.graphicsLive = graphicsLive;
211        graphics = new Graphics();
212    }
213    @Override
214    public void repaintGraphics() {
215        if(graphics == null) return;
216        try {
217            SwingUtilities.invokeAndWait(new Runnable() {
218                @Override
219                public void run() {
220                    graphics.myRepaint();
221                }
222            });
223        } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
224            Logger.getLogger(Driver.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
225        } catch (InvocationTargetException ex) {
226            Logger.getLogger(Driver.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
227        }
228    }
229    @Override
230    public boolean isGraphicsLive() { return graphicsLive; }
231    
232    private static void printUsage() {
233        System.err.println("Usage: Driver [--demo] [--road-network:<filename>] [--routes:<filename>] [--no-simulation] [--no-live-graphics] [--debug]");
234        System.err.println("  --demo\tLoad road network from RoadData-Demo.csv and routes from input-Demo.txt");
235        System.err.println("  --road-network:<filename>\tLoad road network data from <filename>");
236        System.err.println("  --routes:<filename>\tLoad data on parking lots, destinations, and routes from <filename>");
237        System.err.println("  --no-simulation\tDo not run a simulation, only visualize the data");
238        System.err.println("  --no-live-graphics\tDisable live visualisation of traffic simulation");
239        System.err.println("  --debug\tPrint detailed information for debugging");
240    }
241
242    // TODO: comment main method and organize better
243    /**
244     * Main method for Simulation.
245     * @param args the command line arguments
246     */
247    public static void main(String[] args) {
248        String roadNetworkFile = "RoadData.csv";
249        String routesFile = "input.txt";
250        boolean doSimulation = true;
251        boolean printDebugInfo = false;
252        boolean liveGraphics = false;
253        for (String arg : args) {
254            if (arg.equals("--demo")) {
255                roadNetworkFile = "RoadData-Demo.csv";
256                routesFile = "input-Demo.txt";
257            } else if (arg.startsWith("--road-network:")) {
258                roadNetworkFile = arg.substring("--road-network:".length());
259            } else if (arg.startsWith("--routes:")) {
260                routesFile = arg.substring("--routes:".length());
261            } else if (arg.equals("--no-simulation")) {
262                doSimulation = false;
263            } else if (arg.equals("--debug")) {
264                printDebugInfo = true;
265            } else if (arg.equals("--live-graphics")) {
266                liveGraphics = true;
267            } else {
268                printUsage();
269                System.exit(1);
270            }
271        }
272        
273        // TODO: REMOVE!!
274        roadNetworkFile = "RoadData-Demo.csv";
275        routesFile = "input-Demo.txt";
276        //
277        
278        System.err.println();
279        System.err.println("Starting Simulation");
280        System.err.println();
281        
282        DriverInterface driver = Driver.getInstance(1);
283
284        driver.parse(roadNetworkFile, routesFile);
285
286        driver.startGraphics(liveGraphics);
287        driver.setPrintTrace(printDebugInfo);
288        
289        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
290        if (doSimulation) {
291            driver.startIntersections();
292            driver.runSimmulation();
293
294            if(driver.isPrintingTrace()) {
295                System.err.println();
296            }
297           
298            driver.printDestinationsVehicleCount();
299            System.err.println("Number of Events Run: " + driver.getNEventsRun() + " events");
300            System.err.println("Simulation Time:      " + (System.currentTimeMillis() - start) + " milliseconds");
301            System.err.println();
302        }
303    }
304    
305}
